Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v4 (Business Process Flows)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves business process flow information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, only turn this flow on if a tenant-level overview of business process flows is important.

LocalizedName.description: Admin | Sync Template v4 (Business Process Flows)

Description.description: This flow retrieves business process flow information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, only turn this flow on if a tenant-level overview of business process flows is important.
